price: 96. Usun (Yallih gital yingicillee mara kinnuk) Yallak jannatal fayya itta Qarway ittak Amol tanii kee dambi cabtii kee Racmatta kaak Ion, Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwawli kinni.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
